channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-23351|2024-05-06T14:32:20.807Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption as GPU registers beyond the last protected range can be accessed through LPAC submissions.

item.title: CVE-2024-23354|2024-05-06T14:32:22.111Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when the IOCTL call is interrupted by a signal.

item.title: CVE-2024-21474|2024-05-06T14:32:14.501Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when size of buffer from previous call is used without validation or re-initialization.

item.description: Memory corruption while playing audio file having large-sized input buffer.

item.title: CVE-2024-21475|2024-05-06T14:32:15.988Z -- Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon
item.description: Memory corruption when the payload received from firmware is not as per the expected protocol size.

item.description: Memory corruption while processing Codec2 during v13k decoder pitch synthesis.

item.description: Memory corruption when there is failed unmap operation in GPU.

item.description: Memory corruption in Kernel while handling GPU operations.

item.description: Transient DOS while decoding message of size that exceeds the available system memory.
